file_summary: This `build.gradle` file is the primary build configuration script for a Spring Boot application using Gradle. It orchestrates the entire build process, from dependency management to code quality checks and task configurations. The file applies essential Gradle plugins such as 'java' for compilation, 'spring-boot' for Spring application features, 'checkstyle' for code style enforcement, and 'graalvm.buildtools.native' for native image compilation capabilities. It defines project metadata like 'group' and 'version', and specifies Java 17 as the language version. The script declares a comprehensive set of dependencies, including Spring Boot starters for web, data JPA, Thymeleaf, and validation, along with database connectors (H2, MySQL, PostgreSQL), caching libraries, and UI components via WebJars. Test-specific dependencies like Spring Boot Testcontainers are also configured. Furthermore, it sets up Checkstyle with custom configuration files for code quality and `nohttp` checks, and disables specific AOT-related formatting tasks. Finally, it ensures consistent builds by configuring the Gradle Wrapper's version.

functions.name: plugins
functions.description: Applies various Gradle plugins for Java, Spring Boot, code quality, and native image generation.

functions.name: java
functions.description: Configures Java-specific settings, including the language version for the toolchain.

functions.name: repositories
functions.description: Defines the dependency repositories, primarily Maven Central.

functions.name: dependencies
functions.description: Declares project dependencies categorized by scope (implementation, runtimeOnly, developmentOnly, testImplementation, checkstyle).

functions.name: tasks.named('test')
functions.description: Configures the 'test' task to use the JUnit Platform.

functions.name: checkstyle
functions.description: Configures the main Checkstyle plugin, specifying configuration directory and file.

functions.name: checkstyleNohttp
functions.description: Configures a specific Checkstyle instance for 'nohttp' checks, with its own configuration.

functions.name: tasks.named('formatMain').configure
functions.description: Configures 'formatMain' task to depend on 'checkstyleMain' and 'checkstyleNohttp'.

functions.name: tasks.named('formatTest').configure
functions.description: Configures 'formatTest' task to depend on 'checkstyleTest' and 'checkstyleNohttp'.

functions.name: Task Disabling
functions.description: Disables specific AOT (Ahead-of-Time) related checkstyle and format tasks (e.g., checkstyleAot, formatAot).

functions.name: wrapper
functions.description: Configures the Gradle Wrapper's version and distribution type for consistent builds.
